title: Emprez BI Module - Report: Amount paid
content: The Amount paid by Payroll Company report allows you to view, by earnings code, the amounts paid by pay period (in money and as a % of total payroll).Thanks to it, you are able to see if, for overtime, for example, the amounts are stable or not.ðŸ’¡You can also receive this report automatically by email, to learn more click here.TheÂ EMPREZ BIÂ module is available on demand forÂ $1.50/month/employee: request it by opening aÂ ticket!Available for all Admins and Limited Admins; it will be possible to activate it for Managers and Limited Managers only upon request from an Admin.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
